name: Within (itch) (withindev)
description:
Enter the ruthless world kept deep within. Explore the endless halls of flesh and blood desperately seeking the heart. Will you make it out? Or will your corpse join the thousands lost in these forgotten depths.

Within is a proceduraly generated action platformer with roguelike elements and hard difficulty.

Experience a harrowing journey containing

-5 separate areas each with unique enemies

-Over 100 items to use in your journey

-11 powerful and difficult bosses

-A proceduraly generated and destructible world to explore
